name: Marpessa
description:
Master student assignment in University of Skövde

In the conventional story, the princess can only choose to marry a prince. However, if the princess is brave and confident enough, maybe she can become a queen. In this game, the player will be a princess Marpessa to make different decisions in her story to gain love or independent ability to determine her story ending. The narration design is a new adaption of the Greek myths - Idas and Marpessa. Go to acquire one of the 10 endings for the princess!

* The game is developed by Deig.

* All background images are from free open resources.

Keywords: Serious game, intangible heritage
